QR:
1 de1_500_cau1.mp3 Why did Ms. Chen call a meeting today? It’s today At 2:30, I think Because we have to discuss the budget c
2 de1_500_cau2.mp3 Do you know what time the offices close? I think everyone leaves by 5:30 Yes, the offices are closed You really should buy some new clothes a
3 de1_500_cau3.mp3 Who is going to meet Mr. Continue at the airport? He’s at the airport Mrs. Garcia will pick him up At ten o’clock b
4 de1_500_cau4.mp3 When can I call you? Tomorrow morning is a good time Most people just call me Maria My office is the best place to talk a
5 de1_500_cau5.mp3 Where do you usually park your car? There’s a beautiful park nearby In the garage across the street I had to take it to the mechanic last week b
6 de1_500_cau6.mp3 Are you almost ready for the meeting? I met him at the reception last night No, it’s in the big conference room Yes, I just have to finish typing these notes c
7 de1_500_cau7.mp3 Where did you put the packages for Ms. Sato? Ms. Sato is over there They’re on her desk She packed her bags b
8 de1_500_cau8.mp3 Do you know whose keys these are? I left them on your desk I think they’re Mr. Kim’s They’re the keys to the closet door b
9 de1_500_cau9.mp3 When did the director arrive? Since this morning At the airport Late last night c
10 de1_500_cau10.mp3 Did you notice whether Ms. Kovacs was at the reception? Yes, I took thorough notes Yes, she was there Yes, she received it b
11 de1_500_cau11.mp3 Would you like to go to a movie with us after work? Yes, we took a long walk Yes, that’s a great idea Yes, I worked all afternoon b
12 de1_500_cau12.mp3 How long do you plan to stay in Tokyo? Only about three or four days I haven’t been there in a long time At one of the downtown hotels a
13 de1_500_cau13.mp3 How can I make an appointment with Ms. Lee? She’s very happy about her new position You won’t be disappointed You should speak with her assistant c
14 de1_500_cau14.mp3 Were you able to book a hotel for next week? I’ve already read that book Yes, I got a room at a nice place downtown No, I didn’t b
15 de1_500_cau15.mp3 Where would you like to eat dinner? As soon as I finish typing this document We could try that restaurant across the street Yes, I would like that very much b
16 de1_500_cau16.mp3 How long does the bus ride take? It’s only about fifteen minutes It’s not a very big bus It’s a very pleasant ride a
17 de1_500_cau17.mp3 How often do you have to turn in financial reports? Mrs. Gomez is our financial manager Once every month He’s a very good reporter b
18 de1_500_cau18.mp3 You aren’t still working for the same company, are you? No, I got a new job about a month ago No, I went there alone No, it was a different computer a
19 de1_500_cau19.mp3 Why hasn’t Mr. Moreno signed those papers yet? He buys the newspaper every morning Because he hasn’t had a chance to read them No. he hasn’t b
20 de1_500_cau20.mp3 Is there a discount on this furniture? Yes, I can give you twenty-five percent off the regular price Yes, we counted it last night Yes, this is furniture a
21 de1_500_cau21.mp3 When will the new assistant manager start work? In the office down the hall Next week, I think She has a lot of experience b
22 de1_500_cau22.mp3 Did you buy that newspaper downstairs? Yes, we’ll need some more paper Yes, at the newsstand in the lobby Yes, we said good-bye b
23 de1_500_cau23.mp3 When will you be free to meet for lunch? In the cafeteria on the second floor It doesn’t cost anything Next Monday is a good time c
24 de1_500_cau24.mp3 How many people work in this department? Yes, it’s quite a big department There are fifteen altogether I’ve worked here for several years b
25 de1_500_cau25.mp3 Where can I find Mr. Park? He should be in his office now Usually after lunch At 10:45 a
26 de1_500_cau26.mp3 Have you checked your email today? I can give you a check Yes, it is a slow connection No, I’ll check it later c
.
27 de1_500_cau27.mp3 Which movie would you like to watch? It begins at 2 p.m. The new one with Sean Connery I think it costs about $7.00 b
28 de1_500_cau28.mp3 How much does the book weigh? About two pounds $60 Biology a
29 de1_500_cau29.mp3 Could I get you something else to eat? I’m having a hamburger No thanks, I’m full Let’s go to the restaurant b
30 de1_500_cau30.mp3 How many times a week do you play golf? At least three times It’s my favorite sport, too At the club a
31 de1_500_cau31.mp3 Have you met the new secretary? No, not yet She is in the office today Her name is Alice a
32 de1_500_cau32.mp3 Which color do you prefer? It’s on my computer The orange one is nice Can we do it again? b
33 de1_500_cau33.mp3 What time did you start this morning? At 7:00 p.m. In the office At 8:00 a.m c
34 de1_500_cau34.mp3 Where can I make a phone call? There’s a pay phone around the corner It’s on the bus Meet me at the library a
35 de1_500_cau35.mp3 What are your hours today? Sorry, I don’t have a watch We’re open from nine to five In ten minutes c
